languages.text: "Древний ксеноартефакт, старше самого Человечества. Судя по конструкции, это врата... куда-то. Возможно, в сами ужасные бездны варпа — уж больно скверная дрянь вокруг нее водилась. Раньше многие капитаны ими интересовались, Ее Светлость Теодора в том числе. Но никто, кажется, так и не понял, как они работают. Как по мне, и хорошо!"

"An ancient xeno-artefact, older than Humanity itself. Judging by its design, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Possibly straight into the wicked abyss of the warp, considering all the nasty shit that used to roam around here. Many captains, Her Ladyship Theodora included, have tried to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one could figure out how it works. Good for them, if you ask me."
languages.original_text: "Древний ксеноартефакт, старше самого Человечества. Судя по конструкции, это врата... куда-то. Возможно, в сами ужасные бездны варпа — уж больно скверная дрянь вокруг нее водилась. Раньше многие капитаны ими интересовались, Ее Светлость Теодора в том числе. Но никто, кажется, так и не понял, как они работают. Как по мне, и хорошо!"

traits.locale_text: "An ancient xeno-artefact, older than mankind itself. Judging by the construction these are the gates leading... somewhere, maybe into the most horrifying voids of the warp considering all the awful things found nearby. Many captains including her Ladyship Theodora wanted to reveal their secret, but it seems no one figured out the way they work. For their own good, I think."

"An ancient xeno-artefact, older than mankind itself. Judging by the construction these are the gates leading... somewhere, maybe into the most horrifying voids of the warp considering all the awful things found nearby. Many captains including her Ladyship Theodora wanted to reveal their secret, but it seems no one figured out the way they work. For their own good, I think."

"An ancient xeno-artefact, older than mankind itself. Judging by its appearance, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Perhaps, somewhere into the most horrifying abyss of the warp, considering all the abominations found nearby. Many captains, including her Ladyship Theodora, wanted to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one figured out the way it works. For their own good, I think."

Perhaps, somewhere into the most horrifying abyss of the warp, considering all the abominations found nearby. "An ancient xeno-artefact, older than Humanity itself. Judging by its design, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Possibly straight into the wicked abyss of the warp, considering all the nasty shit that used to roam around here. Many captains, Her Ladyship Theodora included, have tried to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one could figure out how it works. Good for them, if you ask me."

languages.text: “这是一件古老的异形造物，比人类本身还要古老。从它的设计来看，这应该是一扇门，通向……某个地方。考虑到附近这些破烂玩意儿，或许这扇门通向亚空间中最要命的深渊。包括西奥多拉夫人在内，很多舰长都想揭开次元门的秘密，但好像没人知道这玩意儿到底是怎么回事。要我说的话，这对他们来说是件好事。”
languages.original_text: "An ancient xeno-artefact, older than Humanity itself. Judging by its design, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Possibly straight into the wicked abyss of the warp, considering all the nasty shit that used to roam around here. Many captains, Her Ladyship Theodora included, have tried to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one could figure out how it works. Good for them, if you ask me."

traits.locale_text: “这是一件古老的异形造物，比人类本身还要古老。从它的设计来看，这应该是一扇门，通向……某个地方。考虑到附近这些破烂玩意儿，或许这扇门通向亚空间中最要命的深渊。包括西奥多拉夫人在内，很多舰长都想揭开次元门的秘密，但好像没人知道这玩意儿到底是怎么回事。要我说的话，这对他们来说是件好事。”

languages.text: « Un xéno-artefact immémorial, plus ancien que l'humanité elle-même. À en juger par son apparence, il s'agit d'une porte menant... quelque part. Probablement dans les abysses sordides du Warp, au vu de toutes les saletés répugnantes qui gravitaient dans les environs. De nombreux capitaines, y compris Sa Seigneurie Théodora, ont cherché à percer ses secrets, mais il semblerait que personne n'ait jamais réussi à en comprendre le fonctionnement. Et c'est sans doute une bonne chose, si vous voulez mon avis. »
languages.original_text: "An ancient xeno-artefact, older than Humanity itself. Judging by its design, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Possibly straight into the wicked abyss of the warp, considering all the nasty shit that used to roam around here. Many captains, Her Ladyship Theodora included, have tried to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one could figure out how it works. Good for them, if you ask me."

Et c'est sans doute une bonne chose, si vous voulez mon avis. »

languages.text: "Ein uraltes Xeno-Artefakt, älter als die Menschheit selbst. Dem Aussehen nach wohl ein Tor, das ... irgendwo hinführt. Möglicherweise geradewegs in den bösen Schlund des Warps, wenn man bedenkt, was für widerwärtiger Scheiß hier allgegenwärtig war. Viele Captains, darunter auch Ihre Ladyschaft Theodora, wollten seine Geheimnisse lüften. Doch offenbar hat niemand je herausgefunden, wie es funktioniert. Da hatten sie Glück, wenn Ihr mich fragt."
languages.original_text: "An ancient xeno-artefact, older than Humanity itself. Judging by its design, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Possibly straight into the wicked abyss of the warp, considering all the nasty shit that used to roam around here. Many captains, Her Ladyship Theodora included, have tried to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one could figure out how it works. Good for them, if you ask me."

Möglicherweise geradewegs in den bösen Schlund des Warps, wenn man bedenkt, was für widerwärtiger Scheiß hier allgegenwärtig war. Viele Captains, darunter auch Ihre Ladyschaft Theodora, wollten seine Geheimnisse lüften. Doch offenbar hat niemand je herausgefunden, wie es funktioniert. Da hatten sie Glück, wenn Ihr mich fragt."

languages.text: «Un xenoartefacto ancestral, más antiguo que la propia Humanidad. A juzgar por el diseño, es un portal que lleva... a alguna parte. A juzgar por toda la mierda que había por aquí, directamente a la boca maldita de la disformidad. Muchos capitanes, incluyendo lady Theodora, han intentado revelar sus secretos, pero por lo visto siempre ha sido en vano. Y francamente, mejor para ellos».
languages.original_text: "An ancient xeno-artefact, older than Humanity itself. Judging by its design, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Possibly straight into the wicked abyss of the warp, considering all the nasty shit that used to roam around here. Many captains, Her Ladyship Theodora included, have tried to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one could figure out how it works. Good for them, if you ask me."

traits.locale_text: «Un xenoartefacto ancestral, más antiguo que la propia Humanidad. A juzgar por el diseño, es un portal que lleva... a alguna parte. A juzgar por toda la mierda que había por aquí, directamente a la boca maldita de la disformidad. Muchos capitanes, incluyendo lady Theodora, han intentado revelar sus secretos, pero por lo visto siempre ha sido en vano. Y francamente, mejor para ellos».

languages.text: 「人類よりも古い、古代の異種族のアーティファクト。その設計から判断する限り、どこか…に通じるゲートだ。多分、邪悪な歪みの深淵へまっすぐ続いているのだろう。 かつてこの辺りを厄介者が徘徊していたことが証拠だ。シオドーラ陛下をはじめ、多くの船長がその秘密を明かそうとしたが、誰もその仕組みを解明できなかったようだ。私に言わせれば、それは彼らにとっては好都合だ」
languages.original_text: "An ancient xeno-artefact, older than Humanity itself. Judging by its design, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Many captains, Her Ladyship Theodora included, have tried to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one could figure out how it works. Good for them, if you ask me."

languages.text: "Kadim bir zeno eseri, İnsanlık bile yanında taze kalır. Tasarımına bakılırsa geçit... Bir yere açılıyor. Buralarda dolaşan fena mahlukları düşünürsek muhtemelen öteboyutun habis boşluğuna açılıyordur. Leydi Theodora Hazretleri de dâhil olmak üzere birçok kaptan, sırlarına kadir olmak için çabalasa da hiçbiri netice alamamış. Bence iyi olmuş."
languages.original_text: "An ancient xeno-artefact, older than Humanity itself. Judging by its design, this is a gate leading... somewhere. Possibly straight into the wicked abyss of the warp, considering all the nasty shit that used to roam around here. Many captains, Her Ladyship Theodora included, have tried to reveal its secrets, but it seems that no one could figure out how it works. Good for them, if you ask me."
